mapper.insert: insert into transfer_application (name, loan_id, transfer_invest_id, invest_id, period, login_name, invest_amount, transfer_amount, transfer_fee, interest_fee, status, deadline, transfer_time, application_time,left_period,source) value (#{name}, #{loanId}, #{transferInvestId}, #{investId}, #{period}, #{loginName}, #{investAmount}, #{transferAmount}, #{transferFee}, #{interestFee},#{status}, #{deadline}, #{transferTime}, #{applicationTime}, #{leftPeriod}, #{source})
